channel.title: N00b questions... please please please help... :(
channel.description:
if you're going to answer one please type the number to the one you answered!! :D also if you dont understand a question please say what u dont understand about it!! just to let you know, i have testscape as my source if that helps ;)
1. if im going to use a ::pickup command, and i only want it used for admins, what is the code for that and how do you make it say if the person is an admin??
2. how can i make it so when a user logs in, i show them a message??
3. how can i make my stats all 99?
4. how do i make someone else a p-mod / mod??
all help is thanked!!! :D thank you all in advance![br][size=1]Posted at: July 10, 2006, 10:06:06 PM[/size][hr] :confused: :( :mad:

item.title: N00b questions... please please please help... :(

item.title: N00b questions... please please please help... :(
item.dc:creator: @Evil1 Evil_
item.description:
@Evil1 wrote:

  1. make the code: else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights >= 2) makes it where only admins and the owner can use
  2. i don’t really know, but if i find out, i’ll tell you.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Budda wrote:

1, 2, 3 & 4. Open the client.java file. READ IT! YOU CAN LEARN A LOT FROM GOING THROUGH THE FILE…

Read full topic

item.title: N00b questions... please please please help... :(
item.dc:creator: @mehaku mehaku
item.description:
@mehaku wrote:

3.) you could either go into client.java and find if
(FightType != 3) {
TotalExp = (double)(4
and change 4 to a number around 50000 or so, this will dramatically enhance the amount of xp given or you could go into characters file, find your name, and make all the stats xp 140000000 or so.
4.) go into their character file and change their privlages to 1 or 2.

Read full topic
